start_01.text: Esok pagi. Syafiq jumpa Dian kat tangga lagi. Dia dah tunggu, dengan notebook tebal dalam tangan.

start_02.speaker: Dian
start_02.text: Aku tak tidur semalam. Compile everything aku tau pasal PPR ni.

start_03.text: Dia buka notebook. Page penuh dengan tulisan rapi, sketches, maps of the building.

notebook_02.speaker: Dian
notebook_02.text: 3 tahun. Sejak aku start sedar pattern. Tengok ni — tingkat 3, suara kanak-kanak nangis setiap Rabu. Tingkat 7, bisikan dalam dialek Hokkien.

notebook_03.text: Dia flip page. More notes, more details. This is years of work.

notebook_04.speaker: Dian
notebook_04.text: Tingkat 9 — yang paling active. Dan semua suara tu, mereka sebut nama sama: 'Tok Pawang Ismail'.

notebook_06.speaker: Dian
notebook_06.text: Bomoh yang duduk Unit 9-4 dulu. Mati 5 tahun lepas. Dan cucu dia... Zafri... dia duduk blok sebelah.

zafri_intro_01.text: Setengah jam kemudian. Syafiq dan Dian tunggu depan flat Zafri. Bunyi TV dari dalam, someone tengok berita.

zafri_intro_02.text: Pintu terbuka. Budak umur sama dengan mereka — mata tajam, rambut kurung rapi, pakai baju kemeja walaupun pagi Sabtu.

zafri_intro_03.speaker: Zafri
zafri_intro_03.text: Dian? Apa hal pagi-pagi ni... oh. Kau Syafiq kan? Yang duduk tingkat 11.

zafri_intro_04.speaker: Dian
zafri_intro_04.text: Zafri, kitorang kena your help. Pasal datuk kau.

zafri_intro_06.speaker: Zafri
zafri_intro_06.text: Masuk dulu. Dan Syafiq... kau ada benda dalam kau. Aku boleh rasa dari sini.

inside_01.text: Dalam rumah Zafri. Living room biasa, tapi ada bookshelf besar penuh dengan buku-buku lama, manuscripts, bottled items on display.

inside_02.speaker: Zafri
inside_02.text: Datuk aku tinggalkan semua ni. 30 tahun dia collect, study, document. Aku spend 3 tahun lepas try faham everything.

inside_03.speaker: Syafiq
inside_03.text: Why you tak just... jadi bomoh macam dia?

inside_04.speaker: Zafri
inside_04.text: Because aku buta and pekak, spiritually. Tak boleh nampak, tak boleh dengar. Zero gift. Tapi aku ada knowledge.

inside_05.speaker: Dian
inside_05.text: Syafiq went into Unit 9-4. Sentuh botol yang retak.

inside_06.text: Zafri freeze. Pandang Syafiq dengan mata wide.

inside_07.speaker: Zafri
inside_07.text: Fuck me. Kau bonded dengan saka. Datuk aku paling takut benda ni.

saka_explanation_02.speaker: Zafri
saka_explanation_02.text: Ancient spirit. Pre-Islamic. Datuk cakap they're like... spiritual parasites. Feed on host's life force. Slowly.

saka_explanation_03.text: Zafri pergi ke bookshelf, keluarkan journal tebal. Buka ke page yang dah marked dengan ribbon.

saka_explanation_04.speaker: Zafri
saka_explanation_04.text: Tengok ni. 'Saka bond cannot be broken easily. Host will experience increasing hunger from entity. Must feed or face consequences.'

saka_explanation_06.speaker: Zafri
saka_explanation_06.text: Other spirits. Capture them, extract their energy, feed to the saka. Datuk aku describe it as... spiritual farming.

choices.text: "So I kena jadi... spirit hunter? Forever?"
"There must be a way to remove this thing."

hunter_path_01.speaker: Zafri
hunter_path_01.text: Not forever. Maybe. Datuk ada tulis ada ways to... manage the relationship. But yeah, basically kau jadi collector sekarang.

removal_path_01.speaker: Zafri
removal_path_01.text: Maybe. Datuk ada note pasal 'severance rituals'. But they're dangerous. High chance of killing the host too.

removal_02.speaker: Dian
removal_02.text: Let's focus on keeping Syafiq alive first. Research removal later.

practical_01.speaker: Zafri
practical_01.text: Ok practical stuff. Kau need bottles, inscriptions, and capture techniques. Lucky for you, datuk left everything in Unit 9-4.

practical_02.speaker: Syafiq
practical_02.text: So I have to go back there.

practical_03.speaker: Zafri
practical_03.text: We. Aku ada knowledge, Dian ada hearing, kau ada power. Team effort.

practical_04.speaker: Dian
practical_04.text: Tunggu. Zafri, your datuk... how did he die?

death_story_01.text: Zafri diam sekejap. Muka dia berubah.

death_story_02.speaker: Zafri
death_story_02.text: Heart attack. But... yang pelik, semua bottled spirits dalam collection dia hilang pada hari yang sama.

death_story_04.speaker: Zafri
death_story_04.text: Bottles kosong. Semua spirits escaped. Aku ingat maybe ada orang pecahkan, tapi tak ada sign of break-in.

death_story_05.speaker: Dian
death_story_05.text: Or maybe someone freed them. Someone who knew exactly which bottles to target.

journal_discovery_01.text: Zafri buka journal to different page. Tunjuk entry dated a few months before his grandfather's death.

journal_discovery_02.speaker: Zafri
journal_discovery_02.text: Last few entries... datuk ada tulis dia worried pasal something. Someone. 'Halim sudah berubah. Dia tak faham consequences.'

journal_discovery_04.speaker: Zafri
journal_discovery_04.text: Used to be datuk's partner. Fellow bomoh. But they had... philosophical differences about spirit management.

journal_discovery_05.text: Zafri flip ke back of the journal. Ada family tree — names connected dengan lines, notes beside each.

family_tree_01.speaker: Zafri
family_tree_01.text: Ni network of bomoh families. Datuk maintain contacts dengan mereka. Sharing knowledge, coordinating seal maintenance...

family_tree_02.text: Syafiq scan the names. Most dia tak kenal. But one name... familiar.

family_tree_03.speaker: Syafiq
family_tree_03.text: Wait. That name... 'Ahmad bin Rashid'. That's... that's my father's name.

revelation_01.text: Silence. Dian dan Zafri pandang Syafiq, then at the journal.

revelation_02.speaker: Zafri
revelation_02.text: Fuck. Your father was in the network. Circle next to his name... dengan note: 'JANGAN LEPASKAN.'

revelation_04.speaker: Zafri
revelation_04.text: The saka. Your father was bonded to the same saka. Datuk aku helped him contain it. But something happened...

revelation_05.text: Zafri flip pages frantically, looking for more info.

revelation_06.speaker: Zafri
revelation_06.text: Here. 'Ahmad disappeared during Cheras incident. Saka contained in emergency bottle. High priority: keep sealed.'

revelation_07.speaker: Syafiq
revelation_07.text: My father didn't leave us. Something happened to him. And now the saka is in me.

choices.text: "I need to find out what happened in Cheras. What happened to my father."
"First priority is learning to control this thing. Father's mystery can wait."

investigation_path_01.speaker: Dian
investigation_path_01.text: Syafiq, I understand. Tapi kalau kau tak learn to manage the saka first, you might not survive long enough to find answers.

investigation_02.speaker: Zafri
investigation_02.text: She's right. And besides, learning to use the saka properly might be the key to finding your father. If he's still alive.

practical_path_01.speaker: Zafri
practical_path_01.text: Ok, plan: we go to Unit 9-4, get the bottles and tools. I'll teach you basic containment theory. First target... something small.

practical_path_02.speaker: Dian
practical_path_02.text: I know exactly the target. Tingkat 12 ada hantu raya. Been causing poltergeist activity for weeks. Residents complaining.

practical_path_04.speaker: Zafri
practical_path_04.text: Low-tier. Angry ghost, basic telekinetic abilities. Perfect for beginners. If you can't handle hantu raya, you definitely can't handle jembalang or djinn.

team_formation_01.speaker: Dian
team_formation_01.text: So we're really doing this. Syafiq the spirit-touched, me the listener, Zafri the researcher. Weird team.

team_formation_02.speaker: Zafri
team_formation_02.text: Datuk aku always said bomoh work better in groups. Different skills complement each other.

team_formation_03.speaker: Syafiq
team_formation_03.text: What if I hurt you guys? What if I lose control?

team_formation_04.speaker: Dian
team_formation_04.text: Then we'll figure it out. Kau tak perlu go through this alone. None of us do.

resolution_01.text: The three of them sit dalam Zafri's living room, surrounded by generations of spiritual knowledge, bonded by necessity dan unexpected trust.

resolution_02.text: Outside, the PPR continues its daily rhythm — unaware that three teenagers just decided to become Malaysia's newest spiritual containment team.

resolution_03.text: Dalam Syafiq, the saka stirs. It senses purpose. Plans. And most importantly... prey.
